name: Maintaining a social life during Game Jams (Simulator)
name_original: Maintaining a social life during Game Jams (Simulator)
description:
You may switch to full screen for a better viewport!!

Simulation project for game jam with topic "I am everywhere"
Game done by me in like 1.5 days
Engine: Unity (2D)
Arts: Aseprite
Sound: https://beepbox.co

Description
Did you ever participate at a Game Jam and try to maintain your social life at the same time? Did you feel like you had to be EVERYWHERE? This game is a very realistic simulation for this situation! Your goal is to complete your Game Jam project in the given 3 minutes of time. Also, you have to attend your Pen&Paper session every 20 seconds. Also, your best friend wants to meet you sometimes and you do not want to make him unhappy! Also, you want to impress your crush with some epic dance moves at the local party!

Controls
Switch rooms with the arrow keys.
Start or stop dancing with the S button. You can only start, if your crush is at the party. When started, dance with the W, A, D buttons.
Continue dialogues with your friend by clicking the left mouse button. You have to read fast!! You may need the A or D button to answer your friend's important question..
